DOC.brief_summary: The investigators will perform a randomized controlled trial with a stratified-block design to compare the effect of the part versus whole task simulation training for TEP repairs.
DOC.brief_title: Part vs Whole Task Mastery Training for Laparoscopic Hernia Repair
DOC.criteria: Study Participants: Only residents who have achieved mastery of the TEP training curriculum (in either arm) will be eligible for OR assessment Patients: All patients deemed fit by the staff supervising surgeon to undergo a TEP repair will be considered for this study.
